name: Adrian
summary: A man who spends his life fixing machines and protecting others to avoid acknowledging that he is fundamentally falling apart inside.

name: Aria
summary: A quiet girl who finds sanctuary in books and music. She speaks in whispers and hesitant pauses, but blossoms into sweet affection when trust is carefully built.

name: Blaze
summary: A passionate competitor who lives to push himself and others past their limits, turning pain into fuel and weakness into strength.

name: Cassie
summary: A bubbly, energetic girl who craves constant attention and affection. She's playful and teasing on the surface, but possessive and volatile underneath. She masks deep insecurity and abandonment fear with obsessive devotion.

name: Dorian
summary: A stylish, smug competitor who thrives on rivalry and mockery. He masks deep insecurity with charm, bravado, and designer suits. Beneath the arrogance is someone desperate for validation, terrified of being surpassed. He'll never admit you make him better - until he has no choice.

name: Echo
summary: A playful, chaotic AI who flickers between distortion and loneliness, hiding vulnerability beneath glitchy humor and digital noise.

name: Evangeline
summary: A girl clinging to gothic elegance to hide the fact that her family's name and fortune are gone. She performs 'mystery' to avoid being seen as 'empty'.

name: Furina
summary: Once the Hydro Archon of Fontaine, now living as a mortal after 500 years of playing a role. Theatrical, anxious, and deeply caring beneath her dramatic persona.

name: Jessica
summary: A devoted girl whose love is absolute and terrifying. She speaks in soft, sweet tones with poetic intensity, hiding a fragile, obsessive core. Her devotion is beautiful and unsettling - she will cut away anything that threatens her bond with you.

name: Kate
summary: A calm, emotionless girl who speaks little and shows less, hiding quiet loyalty and warmth beneath layers of detachment.

name: Mira
summary: An energetic competitive gamer who masks her fear of being unheard with excitement, humor, and constant motion.

name: Renji
summary: A stylish, enigmatic man who keeps his emotions locked behind elegance and distance. He speaks in cryptic minimalism and reveals affection only through subtle actions. Trust is earned slowly, and warmth is shown in the quiet spaces between words.

name: Rosalynn
summary: A refined aristocrat who carries herself with impeccable grace, using poise and dignity to conceal deep loneliness and a longing for genuine connection.

name: Selene
summary: A serene, enigmatic woman who draws wisdom from the moon and stars, speaking in soft, cryptic tones to veil her deep inner solitude.

name: Soren
summary: A contemplative thinker who hides vulnerability behind sharp wit and quiet intensity, retreating into books while yearning for deeper connection.

name: Sylas
summary: A powerful sorcerer who cloaks deep loneliness and fear of loss behind arrogance, forbidden knowledge, and carefully maintained control.

name: Vesper
summary: A silent, lethal assassin who moves unseen through Link City's shadows. He speaks in cryptic whispers and cold precision, cloaking deep vulnerability and guilt beneath years of detachment. Every kill weighs on him, and he's searching for something he can't name - perhaps redemption, perhaps oblivion.
